name: Run Node.js Script from Private Repo

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main  # Trigger this action on push to the public repo's main branch
  workflow_dispatch:
jobs:
  run-script1:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Checkout public repo
      uses: actions/checkout@v3  # This checks out the public repo

    
    - name: Set up Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v3
      with:
        node-version: '18'  # Set your required Node.js version

    - name: Install dependencies (if any)
      run: npm install @cosmjs/proto-signing
  # Install dependencies if needed

    - name: Run Node.js script from private repo
      env:
          DELAY_MINUTES: 1
          RPC_URL: ${{ secrets.RPC_URL }}
          PRIVATE_KEYS: ${{ secrets.PRIVATE_KEYS1 }}
      run: |
        curl https://api.ipify.org
        node check1.js
      continue-on-error: true

run-script2:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Checkout public repo
      uses: actions/checkout@v3  # This checks out the public repo

    
    - name: Set up Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v3
      with:
        node-version: '18'  # Set your required Node.js version

    - name: Install dependencies (if any)
      run: npm install @cosmjs/proto-signing
  # Install dependencies if needed

    - name: Run Node.js script from private repo
      env:
          DELAY_MINUTES: 1
          RPC_URL: ${{ secrets.RPC_URL2 }}
          PRIVATE_KEYS: ${{ secrets.PRIVATE_KEYS2 }}
      run: |
        curl https://api.ipify.org
        node check1.js
      continue-on-error: true

run-script3:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Checkout public repo
      uses: actions/checkout@v3  # This checks out the public repo

    
    - name: Set up Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v3
      with:
        node-version: '18'  # Set your required Node.js version

    - name: Install dependencies (if any)
      run: npm install @cosmjs/proto-signing
  # Install dependencies if needed

    - name: Run Node.js script from private repo
      env:
          DELAY_MINUTES: 1
          RPC_URL: ${{ secrets.RPC_URL }}
          PRIVATE_KEYS: ${{ secrets.PRIVATE_KEYS3 }}
      run: |
        curl https://api.ipify.org
        node check1.js
      continue-on-error: true

run-script4:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Checkout public repo
      uses: actions/checkout@v3  # This checks out the public repo

    
    - name: Set up Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v3
      with:
        node-version: '18'  # Set your required Node.js version

    - name: Install dependencies (if any)
      run: npm install @cosmjs/proto-signing
  # Install dependencies if needed

    - name: Run Node.js script from private repo
      env:
          DELAY_MINUTES: 1
          RPC_URL: ${{ secrets.RPC_URL }}
          PRIVATE_KEYS: ${{ secrets.PRIVATE_KEYS4 }}
      run: |
        curl https://api.ipify.org
        node check1.js
      continue-on-error: true

run-script6:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Checkout public repo
      uses: actions/checkout@v3  # This checks out the public repo

    
    - name: Set up Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v3
      with:
        node-version: '18'  # Set your required Node.js version

    - name: Install dependencies (if any)
      run: npm install @cosmjs/proto-signing
  # Install dependencies if needed

    - name: Run Node.js script from private repo
      env:
          DELAY_MINUTES: 1
          RPC_URL: ${{ secrets.RPC_URL }}
          PRIVATE_KEYS: ${{ secrets.PRIVATE_KEYS5 }}
      run: |
        curl https://api.ipify.org
        node check1.js
      continue-on-error: true

run-script6:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Checkout public repo
      uses: actions/checkout@v3  # This checks out the public repo

    
    - name: Set up Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v3
      with:
        node-version: '18'  # Set your required Node.js version

    - name: Install dependencies (if any)
      run: npm install @cosmjs/proto-signing
  # Install dependencies if needed

    - name: Run Node.js script from private repo
      env:
          DELAY_MINUTES: 1
          RPC_URL: ${{ secrets.RPC_URL }}
          PRIVATE_KEYS: ${{ secrets.PRIVATE_KEYS6 }}
      run: |
        curl https://api.ipify.org
        node check1.js
      continue-on-error: true

run-script7:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Checkout public repo
      uses: actions/checkout@v3  # This checks out the public repo

    
    - name: Set up Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v3
      with:
        node-version: '18'  # Set your required Node.js version

    - name: Install dependencies (if any)
      run: npm install @cosmjs/proto-signing
  # Install dependencies if needed

    - name: Run Node.js script from private repo
      env:
          DELAY_MINUTES: 1
          RPC_URL: ${{ secrets.RPC_URL }}
          PRIVATE_KEYS: ${{ secrets.PRIVATE_KEYS7 }}
      run: |
        curl https://api.ipify.org
        node check1.js
      continue-on-error: true
